name: Black Diamond Circuit Shoes - Men's
description: Comfort and traction for urban approaches or nearby crags. The breathable upper vents heat on warm summer days and the sticky rubber sole keeps you upright when navigating talus fields. The low-rise heel counter flips down so you can slip your feet in while belaying or when leaving the gym.Durable polyester knit upper is highly breathable.Collapsible heel counter for a quick on and off option.Rubber toe cap adds durability and protection for gnarly approaches.Moulded EVA midsole cushions and comforts underfoot.BlackLabel-Street rubber outsole grips trail and urban surfaces.
